title: Set up project structure and tooling
description: Initialize Vite project, configure TypeScript, set up Cloudflare Workers structure

title: Add error handling and user feedback
description:
Improve error messages and user feedback throughout the app:
- Show clear error messages when connection fails
- Display connection status prominently
- Handle edge cases (e.g., WebSocket disconnect, peer timeout)
- Add retry logic for failed connections
- Show progress during file transfer

title: Improve UI/UX styling
description:
Enhance the visual design:
- Better CSS styling for both views
- Responsive design improvements
- Loading states and animations
- File transfer progress bar
- Better QR code presentation
- Mobile-friendly touch targets

title: Add Plausible analytics tracking
description:
Install and configure @plausible-analytics/tracker to track:
- Page views (laptop vs mobile view)
- Connection success/failure events
- File transfer events
- Error events

This will help understand usage patterns and identify issues.

title: Build laptop view with QR code generation
description: Create UI that detects laptop, generates session ID, displays QR code
notes: View selection based on query parameter, not user agent. Laptop view is the default when no session parameter present.

title: Build mobile view with file picker
description: Create UI that detects mobile, allows file selection and upload initiation
notes: View selection based on query parameter, not user agent. Mobile view shown when session parameter present in URL.

title: Implement WebRTC signaling server with Durable Objects
description: Set up Cloudflare Durable Objects for WebSocket-based WebRTC signaling

title: Implement WebRTC peer connection for file transfer
description: Set up WebRTC data channels for peer-to-peer file transfer between devices

title: Add session management and timeout logic
Test end-to-end file sharing flow
description: Test QR scan, pairing, file selection, and transfer completion

title: Deploy to Cloudflare Pages + Workers
description: Set up deployment pipeline, configure custom domain
notes:
GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline already implemented (sharefrom-9).
Remaining work:
- Test actual deployment to Cloudflare
- Configure custom domain (sharefrom.xyz) if desired
- Set up production Durable Objects
- Document deployment process

title: Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD
design:
Create GitHub Actions workflow that runs on push to main:
- Check out code
- Install dependencies
- Run tests (npm test)
- Run typecheck (npm run typecheck)
- Build project (npm run build)
- Deploy to Cloudflare Pages/Workers (npm run deploy)

Will need Cloudflare API token as GitHub secret for deployment.
Workflow should run on pull requests (test/build only) and main (test/build/deploy).
